data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Popov, Yuri A., Heiss, Ernst (2016): A remarkable fossil leptosaldine bug from Mid-Cretaceous Burmese amber (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Leptopodomorpha: Leptopodidae). Zootaxa 4137 (2): 233-238, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4137.2.5
